Package ch.ethz.dcg.jukefox.playmode

Interface Summary
IPlayMode  
 

Class Summary
BasePlayMode  
ContextShuffleManager Handles all the smart shuffling logic.
ContextShuffleManager.PermanentSmartShuffleState  
ContextShufflePlayMode Chooses a smart song once the playlist is at an end.
MagicPlayMode TOOD: work in progress.
PlayerControllerCommand An object of this class represents a command that can be executed on a Playlist.
PlayerControllerCommands Class that contains commands that can be applied to a Playlist.
PlayOncePlayMode Playlist controller which plays a playlist exactly once.
ProcessedSong  
RandomShufflePlayMode Chooses a random song once the playlist is at the end, but avoids choosing a recently played song.
RepeatAllPlayMode Repeats the playlist by going to the first song once the last one finished.
RepeatSongPlayMode This play mode just repeats the current song.
ShufflePlaylistPlayMode Repeats the playlist by going to the first song once the last one finished.
SimilarPlayMode Plays similar songs to the first song being played.
SmartShuffleManager Handles all the smart shuffling logic.
SmartShufflePlayMode Chooses a smart song once the playlist is at an end.
